name: First Steps in Gathering
description: Doran the Village Elder wants to teach you the basics of gathering resources. He believes starting with simple tasks will help you learn the fundamentals of survival.

objectives.description: Speak with Doran the Village Elder

dialog_steps.dialog: Welcome, newcomer. Every journey begins with small steps. Let's start by learning how to gather basic resources.
Thank you, I'm ready to learn!!

completion.message: Well done! You've shown a natural talent for gathering. These basic resources will be essential for crafting tools and items.
completion.return_message: Return to Doran in the Sunny Meadow

name: Crafting Your First Tool
description: Forge the Blacksmith will teach you how to craft your first tool - a simple stone axe that will help you gather more advanced resources.

dialog_steps.dialog: So, you want to learn the art of crafting? Let's start with something simple but useful - a stone axe.
I'd like to learn how to craft tools.

objectives.description: Gather stones from the Rocky Outcrop
Craft a stone axe at the workbench

completion.message: Excellent work! Your first tool. With this axe, you'll be able to chop trees and gather more advanced resources.
completion.return_message: Return to Forge at the Rocky Outcrop

name: Exploring New Horizons
description: Sylvan the Forest Ranger will guide you in exploring the local area and teach you about finding specific resources in different zones.

dialog_steps.dialog: The forest holds many secrets. Let me show you how to find what you need in the wilderness.

objectives.found_message: You've discovered a beautiful sunny meadow full of flowers!

objectives.description: Collect blooming flowers from the meadow

completion.message: You're becoming quite the explorer! Remember, different resources can be found in different areas. Learning where to look is half the battle.
completion.return_message: Return to Sylvan in the Forest

name: Mysterious Fairy Friends
description: Elara the Elder Sage has noticed strange occurrences in the Enchanted Grove involving the fairies. She needs your help to gather evidence about the fairies' activities.

objectives.description: Gather Fairy Petals from the Enchanted Grove.
Collect Glow Fungus to explore the area better.

completion.message: Thank you for your help! These petals and fungi will help us understand the fairies' intentions.
completion.return_message: You have helped before. The fairies thank you!

name: Whispers in the Marsh
description: Vex the Hermit Alchemist has been hearing unsettling whispers coming from the Mystic Marsh. He believes the source may be tied to the ancient magic of the area. He needs your help to gather rare materials and uncover the truth.

objectives.description: Collect 5 Glow Fungus from the Mystic Marsh.
Gather 3 Spring Water from the nearby water sources.
Return to Vex the Hermit Alchemist to discuss your findings.

completion.message: You've brought back the materials! Now, let's see if we can unravel the mystery of the whispers.
completion.return_message: Thank you for your assistance! The whispers grow stronger.
